Name: Cubanita
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7 dash Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: The Bloody Mary returns - this time with rum.
History: Other Bloody Mary variants, in addition to its history, can be found on our Bloody Mary cocktail page .
